meanings.definition: A plastic card issued by a bank, allowing the holder to make purchases or access funds electronically.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my bankcards with me for shopping.
meanings.sent2: She used her bankcards to buy groceries at the store.
meanings.sent3: The bankcards in my wallet like to go on shopping sprees.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of bankcards was a gateway to endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The shiny bankcards gleamed in the sunlight, promising convenience.

meanings.definition: The act of using a bankcard to pay for goods or services.
meanings.sent1: Online purchases are made easy with bankcards.
meanings.sent2: His bankcards were declined at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The bankcards decided to treat themselves to a fancy dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her bankcards danced their way through the checkout process.
meanings.sent5: With a swipe of the bankcards, the transaction was complete.
